minidraw.framework
Interface DrawingEditor

All Known Implementing Classes:
MiniDrawApplication
public interface DrawingEditor

The DrawingEditor is an Object Server pattern that allows the different implementation of MiniDraw roles to access each other. Responsibilities: A) Acts as Object Server for the various parts of MiniDraw. B) Provides access to changing the presently operational tool. Author Henrik Bærbak Christensen 2006
